news.headline: Prediction: Amazon Stock Will Beat the Market. Here's Why.
news.summary: Online sales growth does not have a significant effect on Amazon's overall performance.  The law of large numbers may be a reason why overall revenue growth is in the single digits.  A surprisingly low valuation could help boost Amazon stock longer term.
